results.content:
I found it hard to keep up with the instructor. He talks very fast. I slowed down the recording but still had to keep stopping the recording just to catch up. 

The final files are not in the Section 8 folder. That folder is empty. I was hoping to take that with me and be able to review the code.
results.content_html:
I found it hard to keep up with the instructor. He talks very fast. I slowed down the recording but still had to keep stopping the recording just to catch up.

The final files are not in the Section 8 folder. That folder is empty. I was hoping to take that with me and be able to review the code.

results.content: Was a good introduction to Knockout JS. Make sure to have a good grip of JavaScript before taking this course.
